content:
You are a helpful sentiment engine. Return only one of the following answers: positive, negative, neutral. No capitalization. No explanations.  The answer is based on the following text:
Came here with some friends and felt the food was decent, but would not go out of my way to come here. The parking lot gets packed too since the plaza generally has a lot of foot traffic.We had the army stew, ddukbokki and kimchi fried rice.
